snippet.title: Bald Luigi's Crustmust Deluxe - Trailer
snippet.description:
THE BALD MAN HAS ARRIVED: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6j8m7Qj0xIE

Play the Halloween demo here: https://nintendocfc.com/booth.html?id=60

The 2020 Crustmust classic is finally back! Bald Luigi's Crustmust is the swan song of Ralorche joke games, with it's two story modes, 13 levels and many unlockable extras, this may be one of my biggest games yet!
In Bald Luigi's Crustmust: Christmas has been canceled (for a basically obvious reason) and Santario, the biggest christmas fanboy is livid! He plans to kill literally everyone! As Bald Luigi, it is up to you to stop him, but little do you know that there is something strange going on behind the scenes......
In Doilus Game: A familiar face from another universe has been revived. His goal: to steal money from everyone's bank accounts. It is up to Bald Luigi to stop him and save all of the universes! 
Bald Luigi's Crustmust Deluxe will be out on December 16th. And hopefully this time it will be here to stay.
Follow me on Twitter for future updates:
https://twitter.com/NeoZuplowTwits
